rulings.text: You are never forced to sacrifice any permanents. You can choose to discard your entire hand if your hand is smaller than the number of cards you are required to discard.
You draw the cards, then sacrifice any permanents you want to sacrifice, then discard the required number of card from your hand. There is no chance to play any cards in between these actions.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Surely you know the joy of the hunt, my furry friend. My kind of hunt just takes a different form than yours."
mainBoard.name: Curiosity

rulings.text: "You" refers to the controller of Curiosity, which may be different from the controller of the enchanted creature. "An opponent" refers to an opponent of Curiosity's controller.
Any damage dealt by the enchanted creature to an opponent will cause Curiosity to trigger, not just combat damage.
Curiosity doesn't trigger if the enchanted creature deals damage to a planeswalker or to a battle.

If you control Curiosity and it's enchanting an opponent's creature, you won't draw a card when that creature deals damage to you. The creature has to deal damage to one of your opponents for the ability to trigger.
You draw one card each time the enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, no matter how much damage it deals.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

foreignData.name: Gefängnissphäre
foreignData.text:
Aufblitzen (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch zu jedem Zeitpunkt wirken, zu dem du einen Spontanzauber wirken könntest.)
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Wenn die Gefängnissphäre ins Spiel kommt, tappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
Die verzauberte Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

Encantar criatura.

Flash (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort à tout moment où vous pourriez lancer un éphémère.)

Incanta creatura

foreignData.text:
瞬速（あなたはこの呪文を、あなたがインスタントを唱えられるときならいつでも唱えてよい。）

생물에게 부여
포획 구체가 전장에 들어올 때, 부여된 생물을 탭한다.
부여된 생물은 조종자의 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.
